meta.title: GajiDev - Gaji Developer Indonesia | Salary Developer Engineer Indonesia
meta.description: Cek gaji developer, gaji engineer, dan salary dev di Indonesia. Data gaji software developer, frontend, backend, fullstack engineer dari berbagai sumber terpercaya.

hero.title: Gaji Developer Indonesia - Salary Engineer & Dev
hero.subtitle: Real developer salary data from various positions and experience levels
questions: Is my salary enough as a software engineer?
Is my salary good as a frontend dev?
Am I paid fairly as a backend dev?
Is my salary worth it as a fullstack dev?
Am I underpaid as a mobile dev?
Is my salary enough as a DevOps engineer?
Am I paid fairly as a data engineer?
Is my salary worth it as a QA engineer?
Am I underpaid as a UI/UX designer?
Is my salary good as a product manager?

footer.sources: Data sources: NodeFlair, Glassdoor, Dicoding, Community

percentile.recommendation1: You are in the top tier! Consider negotiating for senior roles.
percentile.recommendation2: You are above average. Keep developing your skills!
percentile.recommendation3: There is room for growth. Consider upskilling or job hunting.
